anpl:
def main(input_grid: np.ndarray) -> np.ndarray:
    colors = "get the colors (except for black and grey) in the input_grid in the order of rows from smallest to largest"(input_grid)
    (height, width) = "Get the grey rect's height and width in the input_grid"(input_grid)
    output_grid = np.zeros([height, width], dtype=np.int32)
    output_grid = output_grid.copy()
    for i in range(output_grid.shape[0]):
        output_grid[i, :] = colors[i]
    return output_grid
